contentrichtext.text: {{Use dmy dates|date=July 2013}} {{Other people|John Fraser}} {{BLP sources|date=March 2009}} '''John Denis Fraser''' (born 30 June 1934) was [[Labour Party (UK)|Labour]] [[Member of Parliament]] for [[Norwood (UK Parliament constituency)|Norwood]] in [[London]] from 1966 to 1997 and a [[solicitor]]. Fraser was educated at Sloan Grammar School and the [[Law Society]] College of Law, becoming a solicitor. He was a councillor on [[Metropolitan Borough of Lambeth|Lambeth Borough Council]] 1962-65 and the [[London Borough of Lambeth]] from 1964. He was a founder member of the [[CDS Co-operatives|Co-operative (Housing) Development Society]]. He was Under Secretary of State for Employment 1974-1976, and [[Minister of State]] at the Department of Prices & Consumer Protection 1976-1979. == References == {{Reflist}} *{{Rayment-hc|date=March 2012}} {{S-start}} {{s-par|uk}} {{S-bef| before = [[John George Smyth]] }} {{s-ttl | title = [[Member of Parliament]] for [[Norwood (UK Parliament constituency)|Norwood]] | years = [[United Kingdom general election, 1966|1966]] – [[United Kingdom general election, 1997|1997]] }} {{s-non | reason = Constituency abolished }} {{S-end}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Fraser, John | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = British politician | DATE OF BIRTH = 30 June 1934 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Fraser, John}} [[Category:1934 births]] [[Category:Members of the United Kingdom Parliament for English constituencies]] [[Category:Councillors in Greater London]] [[Category:Councillors in Lambeth]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs]] [[Category:UK MPs 1966–1970]] [[Category:UK MPs 1970–1974]] [[Category:UK MPs 1974]] [[Category:UK MPs 1974–1979]] [[Category:UK MPs 1979–1983]] [[Category:UK MPs 1983–1987]] [[Category:UK MPs 1987–1992]] [[Category:UK MPs 1992–1997]] [[Category:Members of Lambeth Metropolitan Borough Council]] {{Labour-UK-MP-stub}} {{England-politician-stub}}
